===Etymology 1===
Shared root with {{l|ja|秋|tr=''aki'', "[[autumn]]"}}. Current meaning possibly arising from metaphorical use of the meaning "autumn".

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あき}}

# [[disgust|Disgust]].
# [[having|Having]] one's [[fill]]; [[loss]] of [[interest]].

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|厭き}}
* {{l|ja|飽}}
* {{l|ja|飽き}}

====Idioms====
* {{l/ja|厭きが来る}}: One will become [[fed up]] with or [[lose]] [[interest]] in something that was formerly [[satisfying]].

===Etymology 2===
Probably originally [[onomatopoetic]], much like the English {{m|en|yuck}}.
